DefaultOrder - Class in generation
DefaultOrder provides a basic implementation for an order to interact with a MazeFactory by implementing the Order interface and to cater to a client class of the factory that wants to generate a maze.

deliver(Maze) - Method in class gui.StateGenerating
The deliver method is the call back method for the background thread operated in the maze factory to deliver the ordered product, here the generated maze in its container, the MazeConfiguration object.
